title: 使用Multiverse-Core多世界插件后，主世界刷怪少，新世界正常
author: 君颜未改丶
txt_content:
配置文件 每个世界都设置了HARD了     但是新世界 刷怪正常   主世界刷怪少 ，没有装任何关于怪物的MOD


顺便问一下，魔典盖亚3会影响怪物生成吗？ 以前装了 刷怪不正常 现在删了还是不行

replies.author: DarcJC
replies.txt_content:
刷怪是几率问题啊= -每个世界试试/minecraft:diffculty HARD
还有spigot里设置一下最大怪物

replies.author: 君颜未改丶
replies.txt_content:
z25096708 发表于 2015-8-1 09:42
刷怪是几率问题啊= -每个世界试试/minecraft:diffculty HARD
还有spigot里设置一下最大怪物 ...
这个指令试过了= =    听玩家说怪物挺少的

replies.author: DarcJC
replies.txt_content:
z25096708 发表于 2015-8-1 09:42
刷怪是几率问题啊= -每个世界试试/minecraft:diffculty HARD
还有spigot里设置一下最大怪物 ...
spigot.yml是不是设置了啥

replies.author: 君颜未改丶
replies.txt_content:
z25096708 发表于 2015-8-1 22:20
spigot.yml是不是设置了啥
这个没调过  内容是这样的
This is the main configuration file for Spigot.
# As you can see, there's tons to configure. Some options may impact gameplay, so use
# with caution, and make sure you know what each option does before configuring.
# For a reference for any variable inside this file, check out the Spigot wiki at

# If you need help with the configuration or have any questions related to Spigot,
# join us at the IRC or drop by our forums and leave a post.

# IRC: #spigot @ irc.esper.net ( http://webchat.esper.net/?channel=spigot )
# Forums: http://www.spigotmc.org/forum/

config-version: 5
messages:

  restart: Server is restarting
commands:
  tab-complete: true
  log: true
stats:
  disable-saving: false
  forced-stats: {}
settings:

  sample-count: 12
  timeout-time: 90
  restart-on-crash: true
  restart-script: ./start.sh
  netty-threads: 4
  late-bind: false
  bungeecord: false
  fullMatchRate: 10
world-settings:
  default:
    verbose: false
    arrow-despawn-rate: 120
    item-despawn-rate: 6000

    random-light-updates: false

      hopper-check: 8
    mob-spawn-range: 4
    save-structure-info: false

      enabled: false
      engine-mode: 1

      monsters: 32
      misc: 24

    max-bulk-chunks: 5
    max-entity-collisions: 2
